explanation: [0-0] In a football match, there is a team of players in pink jerseys and another team in yellow shirts and blue shorts, with a player in yellow lying on the ground holding his stomach on the left.

[0-5] Then a yellow highlighted circle appears next to a pink player at the bottom of the screen, while a yellow "MESSI" subtitle and a red inverted triangle symbol appear above his head. MESSI receives the football and moves forward quickly, while a yellow player rushes in from the left to intercept. As the yellow player approaches, MESSI quickly kicks the ball up, flying it over the player lying on the ground. Seeing this, the yellow player immediately raises his hands and stops next to MESSI. Then the camera zooms in on MESSI, and it can be clearly seen that MESSI kicks the ball over the yellow player. Then the camera returns to a view of everyone, and MESSI receives the ball passed from the yellow player and lifts his foot to shoot. At this time, a yellow player appears and blocks the shot. The picture then focuses on MESSI's upper body as he smiles awkwardly and walks forward, with an emoji with a smiling face at the bottom of the picture.

A yellow "MESSI" subtitle appears on the right of the man in black. MESSI turns to look at the two little boys, and then a yellow circle encloses the two little boys in the picture. After the boy on the left makes a thumbs-down gesture with his thumb, he points forward with his index finger, while the boy on the right makes a thumbs-up gesture.
